title: Zpl Labels
objective: Automate the generation and printing of ZPL labels from the application on a local server, integrated with CUPS.
milestones: Optimized product labeling process, reducing errors and processing time.
Simplified the task to just 3 buttons, maximizing user efficiency.
shortResume: Automate the generation and printing of ZPL labels from the application on a local server, integrated with CUPS.
